title: Rumors of large cellular phone purchases
subtitle: According to social media rumours, many suspicious purchases of 60 cell phones were made by Middle Eastern men in Walmartz in or around Lebanon, Missouri.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Men from the Middle East purchased dozens of burner cell phones in and around the Martas in Lebanon in Missouri (which were supposed to carry out terrorist attacks); at the same time, several warehouses reported thefts of propane tanks.
